title: Episode #18 "Big Girls Don't Cry"
description:
This is an exciting episode with Terry Winter. He talks with Michael and Steve about how he got his start in the business, how he came up with many of the ideas for the show and writing the script for The Wolf of Wall Street. It’s a great interview! Then a second special guest joins the show as Michael and Steve reminisce about their love of baseball. In a crazy moment they discover they may have actually crossed paths at a famous game over 50 years ago. 

Then Michael and Steve breakdown this week’s amazing episode. This was the first shot with Federico Castelluccio (Furio) and you have you hear how at 4:30am on day one he absolutely knocked it of the park…..literally. The guys discuss how big questions are starting to arise for Tony Soprano and Christopher’s incredible James Dean. It’s all on Talking Sopranos #18 S2 E5 “Big Girls Don’t Cry”. 

Make sure to go to subscribe to the talking sopranos podcast where ever you get your podcasts and go to talkingsopranos.com to post questions for Michael and Steve.
author: talkingsopranos@gmail.com (Michael Imperioli, Terry Winter, Steve Schirripa)
